targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname'
LIMIT 10000;
-- ORDER BY mean_exec_time DESC
-- LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND calls > 0
ORDER BY calls DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.calls AS value, s.mean_exec_time AS rt
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND calls > 0
ORDER BY calls DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND rows > 0
ORDER BY rows DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.rows AS value, s.mean_exec_time AS rt
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND rows > 0
ORDER BY calls DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND total_exec_time > 0
ORDER BY total_exec_time DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.total_exec_time AS value, s.mean_exec_time AS rt
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND total_exec_time > 0
ORDER BY total_exec_time DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND wal_bytes > 0
ORDER BY wal_bytes DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.wal_bytes AS value, s.mean_exec_time AS rt
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND wal_bytes > 0
ORDER BY wal_bytes DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE queryid IN (SELECT queryid FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements GROUP BY queryid HAVING count(*) > 1)
LIMIT 100;

list.definition: SELECT distinct queryid::TEXT FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND userid != 10 LIMIT 1000;
list.label: Query
list.name: query
list.query: SELECT distinct queryid::TEXT FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND userid != 10 LIMIT 1000;
